Text:

"Experience makes a man perfect", would mean there's a limit to experience and since the experience is undefined it's all encompassing.  Meaning experience is an unlimited potential, meaning man can never be perfect.  "Practice makes a man perfect", refers to a limited aspect and that the perfection is in something he seeks, singularly.
